articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent messages to foreign party and state leaders in reply to their congratulatory messages and letters on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					 They are Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba; Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party, president of Laos and chairman of the Central Committee of Defence and Security of Laos; Zillur Rahman, president of Bangladesh; Bashar Al-Assad, regional secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party and president of Syria; Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia; Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president of Nigeria and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces; Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of Democratic Congo; Girma Wolde-Giorgis, president of Ethiopia; and Thomas Motsoahe Thabane, prime minister of Lesotho. 
					
					 In the messages he expressed deep thanks to them for sincere congratulations and best wishes. 
					
					 He wished them successes in their work for the prosperity of the countries, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and those countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Hungarian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Hungarian President
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Janos Ader, president of Hungary, on its national day.
					 Kim in his message expressed belief that the cooperative relations between the DPRK and Hungary would grow stronger in conformity with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Slams Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Slams Ulji Freedom Guardian 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Monday issued the following statement:
					 Dark clouds of a war are hanging over the Korean Peninsula in which the north and the south of Korea stand in the most acute military stand-off in the world.
					
					 The U.S. finally kicked off extremely provocative large-scale joint military exercises, defying the unanimous desire of the people at home and abroad for peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian, a military expression of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, is aimed at invading it, to all intents and purposes. Hurled into the war drills now under way across south Korea are huge aggression troops enough to fight a war according to the mode of an actual war to invade and seize the DPRK all of a sudden.
					
					 This large-scale saber-rattling kicked off by the U.S. in the wake of patronizing and instigating hideous hostile acts of the south Korean puppet regime to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is an undisguised military provocation.
					
					 In recent years the U.S. staged big joint military drills more often and in more intensive manner, pursuant to its new defense strategy to contain the DPRK and countries around it by force. The core of the new defense strategy calls for shifting the strategic focus to the Asia-Pacific region and putting Asia under control through massive arms buildup and military blackmail.
					
					 Its primary target is to bring down the DPRK by force and use the whole Korean Peninsula as a springboard for realizing the strategy to dominate Asia.
					
					 The prevailing situation requires the DPRK to bolster up the war deterrent physically and goes to prove that it was entirely just when it determined to fully reexamine the nuclear issue. 
					
					 The DPRK's war deterrent serves as a just means for retaliation as it is capable of mercilessly punishing any aggressors no matter where they are on this earth.
					
					 This is an all-powerful treasured sword for protecting the sovereignty of the country and a powerful means for deterring the war on the Korean Peninsula. It also provides a firm guarantee for concentrating efforts on economic construction and the improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 It is a stark reality on the peninsula that talking alone cannot prevent a war.
					
					 The arms of the country guarantee its peace and prosperity.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the situation and roll back at once its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. persistent pursuance of its invariable hostile policy would only precipitate its miserable end.
					
					 It is the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to counter the aggressors' preemptive firing with deadly counter-actions and achieve the country's reunification through this decisive war.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs led by Deputy General Director Mun Jae Chol left here Monday to visit Mongolia.

articles.title: Second Rason International Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
Second Rason International Trade Fair Opens
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Second Rason International Trade Fair opened with due ceremony in Rason on Monday.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the venue and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present there were Jo Jong Ho, chairman of the Rason City People's Committee who is chairman of the organizing committee of the fair, officials concerned, officials in the city of Rason, scientists and technicians, representatives and exhibitors of different countries and regions, foreigners active in the Rason economic and trade zone and the consuls general of China and Russia in Chongjin.
					
					 An opening address and a congratulatory speech were made there.
					
					 The speakers referred to the fact that the fair would contribute to bringing about economic development and common prosperity of different countries of the world.
					
					 They expressed belief that the participants would conduct positive and wide-ranging dialogue and multi-faceted commercial and trade activities.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round electrical  and electronic products, vehicles, light industry goods, medicaments and other commodities presented by more than 110 units of different countries and regions including the DPRK, China, Russia, Sweden, the Czech Republic and Taipei of China.
					
					 A reception was given on the same day in connection with the inauguration of the fair.

articles.title: Participants in Torchlight Relay Race Pass North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Participants in Torchlight Relay Race Pass North Phyongan Province
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Members of the young vanguard participating in the torchlight relay race from the west coastal area passed through Sinuiju City Monday after their start on Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the Youth Day.
					 Members of the young vanguard of North Phyongan Province took over the torchlight in Hyangsan County on August 17 after it passed through Ryanggang and Jagang Provinces.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Hyangsan County before paying tribute to him.
					
					 After leaving Hyangsan County amid the warm send-off of people, they arrived at Changsong County via Tongchang County.
					
					 They took part in a campfire meeting of youth and students in Changsong County.
					
					 The participants in the meeting vowed to make the torchlight handed by the former generation of the revolution rage more fiercely by remaining true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 After arriving in Sinuiju City via Changsong County and Uiju County they held a meeting of youth and students in North Phyongan Province with persons of distinguished services of the former generation.
					
					 They took part in a meeting held to hear about experience gained by the head of a youth sub-work team in the Sinam Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County.
					
					 The speaker noted that building one's residential area and work site into a land of bliss in the Songun era is a noble duty of the young people, the descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The participants in the torchlight relay race ran toward Tongrim and Kwaksan Counties, Jongju City and Pakchon County after leaving Ryongchon County.
					
					 Officials, working people and school youth and children in the cities and counties warmly sent them off.
					
					 The participants in the relay race are vigorously running toward Pyongyang.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Guidance to Students' Military Camping Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Guidance to Students' Military Camping Observed
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's guidance to military camping of students of Kim Il Sung University in Oun-dong. 
					 All the participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il guided the military camping of students in Oun-dong for more than 40 days from August 20, 1962. 
					
					 He developed and enriched the Juche-oriented military ideas, theories and war methods of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He led all the campers to regard the camping period as military service, train themselves under the simulated conditions of an actual battle, live as required by military rules and drill manual and thus prepare themselves as soldiers. 
					
					 He spent the camping period without allowing any privilege, thus showing the noble personality as the brilliant Songun commander. 
					
					 Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, in his report stressed the need for officials and university students to deeply grasp the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed during his guidance to the military camping in Oun-dong and sincerely learn military affairs to fully prepare themselves politically and ideologically and in military technology. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave an order while inspecting the island defence detachments stationed in the southernmost part of the southwest front, the reporter said, and went on: This order makes all members of the young vanguard of the country aboil with the firm will to wipe out the enemy. 
					
					 If a war breaks out, all the university students should change their pens with arms and turn out in the war for national reunification to mercilessly wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the rat-like Myung Bak group of traitors and fully demonstrate the heroic spirit of the Korean youth in the Songun era. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Mun Kyong Dok and others, officials of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations, university teachers and students in Pyongyang, officials and employees of the Oun Revolutionary Museum.

articles.title: DPRK Army and People Ready for Decisive Battle
articles.content:
DPRK Army and People Ready for Decisive Battle
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, during his recent inspection tour of island defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwest front, ordered the servicepersons to deal at once deadly counter-blows at the enemy if even a single shell is dropped on the waters or in the area of the DPRK and lead the battle to a sacred war for national reunification.  
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has entered a touch-and-go phase due to the ongoing Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, kicked off by the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 On the supreme commander's order, all the servicepersons and people are now in combat posture to deal an annihilating blow to the provokers if they ignite a war.
					
					 The C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea and other public organizations in the DPRK made public a joint statement. The statement said if the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea dare preempt reckless firing, it will not be confined to a local war and the DPRK will never miss the priceless golden opportunity but lead it to a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 Local people of various social strata are petitioning joining or rejoining the Korean People's Army, determined not to miss an opportunity for bringing about national reunification. 
					
					 Spotlighted in Central TV and other local media are songs and poems mirroring the will of the army and people to wipe out the enemies without mercy. 
					
					 The world people will witness how the DPRK counterattacks the warmongers to achieve national reunification.

articles.title: Documents on Tok Islets of Korea Opened to Public
articles.content:
Documents on Tok Islets of Korea Opened to Public
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS reported Saturday it obtained documents proving that Tok Islets are part of the inalienable territory of Korea. 
					 According to it, the document the minister of internal affairs of Korea sent to the head of Ullung Island County who had jurisdiction over Ullung Island and Tok Islets in 1902 contained detailed regulations which called for receiving duties from all the goods coming in and going out of Ullung Island. This shows that the administrative power of the then government of the Ri Dynasty extended as far as Tok Islets. 
					
					 According to the document, a contract made by Japanese traders, who had gone to Tok Islets to get ear shells around 1900, contained a promise to pay export duties to the chief supervisor of Ullung Island of Korea and the list of Japanese merchants who signed it. 
					
					 Also discovered is a document of the Foreign Ministry of Japan proving the fact that Japanese traders paid export duties. 
					
					 KBS said that experts claim the above-said facts are international legal evidence proving that "Korea effectively dominated Tok Islets and they are part of the territory of Korea."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Authors Many Works for Development of Youth Movement
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Authors Many Works for Development of Youth Movement
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The history of the Juche-oriented Korean youth movement is brilliantly shining with the immortal exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed by authoring a lot of works on the youth movement through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					 The works comprehensively deal with characteristics and mission of the Korean youth movement and its main duty and revolutionary principle and other issues to be settled for steadily developing it.
					
					 The works "On Improving the Work of the Youth League to Meet the Requirements of the Developing Situation" and "On Further Strengthening Education in Revolutionary Traditions among Young People and Children" published by him in the 1960s serve as important documents for bringing about a turn in putting the Korean youth movement on a fresh higher stage.
					
					 "On Some Tasks  Facing the League of Socialist Working Youth at Present", "Let Us Inspire the Young People with the Spirit of Continuous Revolution" and other works comprehensively deal with tasks and ways for the young people to play a pioneer's role in all fields and at all units of socialist construction.
					
					 He authored "On Further Strengthening the Party Guidance to the Young People and Children", "The Present Times and the Tasks Facing Young People", "It Is Necessary to Strengthen the Work with Young People" and other works in the 1980s when the Korean youth turned out in the drive to carry out the decision of the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. They clarify all the issues for youth work including the matters of intensifying the party's leadership for young people, firmly building up the youth league ranks and increasing the function and role of primary organizations, basic organizations of the youth league.
					
					 In "On Mission and Duty of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League" and other works in the 1990s he clarified the final goal of the Korean youth movement and the basic mission of the youth league to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung generation after generation.
					
					 "Let Us Exalt the Brilliance of Comrade Kim Il Sung's Idea on the Youth Movement and the Achievements Made under His Leadership", "Let Young People Highly Exalt the Honor of Young Vanguard in Songun Era by Carrying Forward the Tradition of Youth Movement of Juche" and other works powerfully encourage the young people to work miracles and innovations in the revolution and construction.

articles.title: Selected Works of Kim Jong Il (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 17 Published
articles.content:
Selected Works of Kim Jong Il (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 17 Published 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Volume 17 of Selected Works of Kim Jong Il (enlarged edition) was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House. 
					 The book contains 26 works including speeches, papers and talks published by leader Kim Jong Il from May 1992 to May 1994. 
					
					 In the works "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" and "Let Us More Firmly Strengthen Socialist Revolutionary Position by Doing Party Work Well" he indicated unique ideas, theories and policies for strengthening the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche type and enhancing its leadership role. 
					
					 Such works as "Let's Give Fuller Play to the Advantages of Our People's Power" and "On Some Problems Arising in the Party, State and Economic Work" clarify the solid nature, vitality, function and role of the people's power, the basic principle for building the people's power and issues arising in strengthening the work of people's power bodies. 
					
					 In the work "On Declaring State of Semi-War for Whole Country, People and Army" he laid down a revolutionary policy for frustrating the joint military exercises Team Spirit 93 of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime for aggression and protecting the security of the DPRK and its people. 
					
					 There are works which give clear answers to theoretical and practical issues concerning socialist economic construction, the matters related to the tasks facing the officials in revolution and construction and clarify the basic mission and essential character of the Korean youth movement. 
					
					 There are also works indicating tasks and ways for building socialist national culture and giving full play to the advantages of healthcare system in the DPRK. 
					
					 The book also deals with the ideas, theories and policies for stepping up the modernization of post and tele-communication and improving city management and forestry as required by the developing situation.

articles.title: "Fly High, Our Party Flag", Paean Dedicated to WPK
articles.content:
"Fly High, Our Party Flag", Paean Dedicated to WPK
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The song "Fly High, Our Party Flag", which was created 20 years ago, is heard everywhere in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 It is now inspiring people in their efforts for recovering from flood damage.
					
					 Ho Song Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, who is mobilized in a recovery operation in South Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					 "We, servicepersons, are pressing ahead with the recovery work, inspired by the song.
					
					 Singing the song, we are working day and night, overfulfilling the daily assignments. Looking up to the red flag of the Workers' Party of Korea, inscribed with hammer, sickle and brush flag, we are overcoming all sorts of difficulties.
					
					 We hold the flag dearer than our lives."
					
					 Ham Il Gwan, another KPA officer, said:
					
					 "It sings of the truth that the Korean people can tide over any difficulties only when they follow the way indicated by the WPK.
					
					 It instills the belief in the minds of the Korean people that their leader and the WPK are the best in the world and that they are sure to win the final victory."
					
					 Ko Nam Suk, an official of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, said:
					
					 "The Korean people owe their happiness and bright prospect to the WPK guidance. Encouraged by the song, we have turned out in the drive to make the province more prosperous."

articles.title: DPRK Women's Team Trounces Its Norwegian Rival 4:2
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Team Trounces Its Norwegian Rival 4:2
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team defeated its Norwegian rival 4:2 in the 2012 U-20 Women's World Cup now under way in Japan. 
					 The DPRK team will play its second match with its Argentine rival on August 23.

articles.title: Heavy Shower Occurs in DPRK Again
articles.content:
Heavy Shower Occurs in DPRK Again
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Torrential rain swept through the west and east coastal areas in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Aug. 17-19.
					 According to data available, Phyongsan and Singye counties in North Hwanghae Province witnessed 494 mm and 424 mm rainfalls respectively, while Sepho and Ichon counties in Kangwon Province 469 mm and 434 mm rainfalls respectively.
					
					 It rained 355 mm in Yodok County, South Hamgyong Province, 349 mm in Sinphyong County, North Hwanghae Province and 302 mm in Pongchon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 298 mm rainfall was observed in Samsok District, Pyongyang, 289 mm in Kumchon and 277 mm in Rinsan counties, North Hwanghae Province and 285 mm in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Some 10 areas had precipitation above 200 mm and more than 50 areas above 100 mm throughout the country.
					
					 The downpour was accompanied by a strong wind in Phyongsong and Haeju cities, Pongchon and Phyongsan counties.

articles.title: Mass Killing of Koreans after Kanto Quake
articles.content:
Mass Killing of Koreans after Kanto Quake
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The quake which jolted Kanto area, Japan in September 1923, served as an opportunity for the Japanese government to massively kill Koreans in Japan.
					The devastating quake havocked the whole of the Kanto area, leaving a large number of people homeless.
					
					 Instead of taking emergency relief measures, the Japanese government hatched a terrible plot to massacre Koreans in a bid to calm down growing public anger at the government.
					
					 Accordingly, the Japanese reactionaries spread false rumors that Koreans had set fire and put poison into wells and sent instructions to each local magistrate to crack down on the Koreans.
					
					 In response to the instructions, Japanese hooligans indiscriminately killed Koreans by use of various sorts of lethal weapons.
					
					  They shot, stabbed and burnt to death innocent Koreans. They even cut throats of Korean children in front of their parents.
					
					 They stopped passers-by and made them pronounce Japanese words and in case their pronunciation was not fluent they were killed on the scene, believed to be Koreans.
					
					 The death toll of Koreans in the massacre amounted to 23 000.
					
					 The barbarity is recorded in history as a heinous crime.
					
					Japan should make an apology for its crimes committed against the Korean nation in the past without delay.
					
					It is a legal and moral obligation for Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-people Resistance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-people Resistance 
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls on all service personnel and people of the DPRK to fully display the heroic spirit of Songun Korea in devotedly defending the country and building a thriving nation, firmly rallied around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The army and people of the DPRK enshrine the order given by him during his inspection of island defence detachments in southernmost part of the southwest front as a signal fire for taking the most merciless retaliation in world history and a historic declaration heralding the doom of the enemy, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 No force on earth can match the army and people all out as one with the will to thoroughly implement the order given by their leader, single-mindedly united around him.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have the bonds of kinship with Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un on the basis of love, obligation, trust and loyalty.
					
					 They are closely linked with him in militant ties and in patriotic practice as their hearts are burning with patriotic will.
					
					 The celebrations of war victory day in July provided by him strikingly demonstrated before the world that collectivism and popular heroism fully displayed by war veterans live on as the spirit of sure victory of Songun Korea.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who share breath and pulse with him in the same fighting spirit as displayed in the 1950s will display the same popular heroism as done by the war veterans and unconditionally implement the order given by him. 
					
					 The generation which won victory in the Fatherland Liberation War on July 27 is sure to be followed by the Songun generation that will achieve a final victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Ulji Freedom Guardian as Drills for Preemptive Nuclear Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Ulji Freedom Guardian as Drills for Preemptive Nuclear Attack on DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military maneuvers are an escalation of the drills for a nuclear war against the DPRK to all intents and purposes, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The warmongers at home and abroad claim the joint military drills are "annual" and "defensive" but this is no more than rhetoric to justify their drills for a war against the north.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that Ulji Freedom Guardian exercises are unpardonable drills to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK in the light of their historical roots, scope, nature and programs and purposes, the article goes on:
					
					 The on-going exercises have put the peace on the Korean Peninsula at serious peril and are making the dark clouds of a nuclear war heavily hanging over the heads of the Koreans.
					
					 The prevailing situation goes to clearly prove that though the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime say they "have no hostile intents" on the DPRK, they are watching for a chance to provoke a new war in actuality.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are closely following every move of the enemy with bitter resentment at the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, in hearty response to the order given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its war deterrent for self-defence to cope with the reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime for a nuclear war. Should they preempt firing at the DPRK, it will never miss the opportunity but wage a great war for national reunification.
					
					 The DPRK will achieve the country's reunification through this decisive war by removing the Military Demarcation Line.

articles.title: Reappointment of Chairman of "Human Rights Committee" of S. Korea Assailed
articles.content:
Reappointment of Chairman of "Human Rights Committee" of S. Korea Assailed 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Of late, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea reappointed Hyon Pyong Chol as chairman of the "Human Rights Committee", defying the strong opposition of the public.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Hyon, after holding the post of the chairman of the committee in the present conservative regime, is a fascist who has wantonly violated the democratic freedom and rights of the south Koreans and taken the lead in inciting the confrontation with the DPRK under the pretext of "human rights".
					
					 The south Korean people are becoming increasingly assertive in calling for judging the conservative ruling forces with the approach of the "presidential elections".
					
					 The period of Lee's tenure of office is interwoven with crimes against humanity and human rights abuses.
					
					 Their revelation will be enough to make him stand trial, not just impeachment.
					
					 Particularly, the south Korean people's wrath against the regime is running the highest now as it pushed the inter-Korean relations to the collapse and increased the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 Much upset by this, Lee is making last-ditch efforts to overcome the ruling crisis and attain his inveterate black-hearted ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					 Hyon's reappointment was prompted by this aim.
					
					 The Lee regime is gravely mistaken if it thinks it can hide its human rights abuses and realize its ambition for confrontation by taking under its wings the wicked element who has taken the lead in kicking up the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Activities for Friendship with Russia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Activities for Friendship with Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Monday calls for consolidating and shining leader Kim Jong Il's immortal feats for the DPRK-Russia friendship.
					 His visit to Siberian and Far Eastern region of Russia left unforgettable traces in the history of DPRK-Russia friendship and the world political diplomacy, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 He put the dignity and honor of the Korean nation on the highest level through his energetic foreign activities and forged close ties with Russia, thereby heartening and inspiring the world progressives aspiring after independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 His historic visit to Russia served as a significant event that opened a bright prospect for establishing fair international relations and pushing forward the cause of global independence.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to constantly develop the traditional friendship with Russia to meet the demand for better international relations in the new century.
					
					 It is the common desire of the two peoples to boost the bilateral ties with the long historical tradition as required by the new century. The bilateral friendly and cooperative ties will further expand and develop by the positive efforts of the two peoples.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at Ulji Freedom Guardian Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at Ulji Freedom Guardian Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean authorities finally kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises despite strong public denunciation and rebuff at home and abroad.
					 The maneuvers drew 30 000-strong U.S. forces including the troops overseas, 56 000-strong south Korean puppet army and hundreds of thousands of civilians.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined commentary terms this a saber-rattling targeting the DPRK.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S. authorities are calling the exercises "annual military drills" and "drills for defense" to cover up their provocative and aggressive nature. But no one will believe it.
					
					 Staging powder-reeking military drills in the Korean Peninsula which is beset with permanent danger of war due to acute political and military stand-off are a serious provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 If the hysteria of warmongers is put into practice on the peninsula, it will have catastrophic effect on the peace in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The world is well aware of who is provoker of a war on the peninsula and wrecker of peace.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle it by force of arms. It is its immutable stand and principle to return to good faith with good faith and counter force with force. If even a single shell is dropped on the territory of the DPRK by the U.S. imperialists' provocation, its army and people will promptly move to deal deadly counter-blows at the enemy and lead them to a sacred war for the reunification of the country by the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills Targeting DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills Targeting DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressors and the south Korean regime of traitors finally kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills Monday despite the DPRK's repeated warnings.
					 Hurled into the drills which will last till August 31 are more than 30 000 U.S. imperialist aggression troops, 56 000 south Korean troops and at least 440 000 civilians. What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. has drawn even military personnel of its allies.
					
					 The ill-boding war rehearsal reminding one of the past June 25 war deserves curses as it is a serious challenge to the desire of the public at home and abroad for peace and detente on the Korean Peninsula, and a declaration of an all-out war against the DPRK.
					
					 The situation on the peninsula has reached the extremes in the wake of the disclosure of the attempt of hideous state-sponsored and politically-motivated terrorism that was pushed forward by the U.S. and the south Korean regime targeting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Any contingency under the grim prevailing situation can immediately lead to a total war. This is a lesson drawn from the history of wars.
					
					 Holding war rehearsal like Ulji Freedom Guardian on the Korean Peninsula, one of the world's flashpoints, proves that the U.S. and south Korea's reckless attempt to ignite a new war has been deliberately put into the phase of practical implementation.
					
					 The warmongers amassed all kinds of war means on Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea in which both sides stand in the most acute military standoff and the interests of many countries are intertwined, and have played up anti-DPRK war hysteria.
					
					 The south Korean regime hurled into the drills even mine-proof special vehicles out of a host of war hardware it brought from the U.S., openly disclosing their attempt at invasion through the operation of breaking through the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 Blue Ridge, flagship of the U.S. Navy's 7th Fleet specializing in aggression overseas, and huge fleets and aviation troops and even nuclear strike means of the U.S. imperialists have been hurled into the drills. Clear is their aim.
					
					 The primary aim is to preempt strikes at the supreme headquarters of the Korean revolution and nuclear and missile bases and other strategic strongholds in the DPRK and occupy it and stage civilian operations in a bid to lay a political, economic and military foundation for creating a bridgehead for Asian invasion.
					
					 All facts prove who is an arch criminal destroying peace and security and a war provocateur in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are hardly repressing towering resentment at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime which are working hard to ignite a war against the DPRK, not content with their attempt at the hideous state-sponsored terrorism hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Should the U.S. and south Korean warmongers drop even a single shell and bullet on the inviolable territory and waters of the DPRK, its army and people will never miss the golden opportunity but wage a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 The DPRK has invincible military muscle and self-defensive deterrent capable of mercilessly annihilating any aggressors, and Kim Jong Il's patriotism and single-minded unity which are more powerful than a nuclear weapon.
					
					 The field inspection of the most hotspot area in the southernmost part of the southwestern front by Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un is heartening the service personnel and people of the DPRK and their spirit of annihilating enemies is running high.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK who are replete with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the country, confident of sure victory, will most mercilessly punish aggressors and provokers in the order of great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The world will see how the great country of Mt. Paektu deal deadly strikes at the warmongers and greet another war victory day under the leadership of the illustrious brilliant commander.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Foreign Internet Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Foreign Internet Websites
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The full text or the gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was posted on Internet websites in various countries. 
					 The work made public on July 26, 2012 clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life characterized by love for the country and its people.
					
					 The work also clarifies important issues in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The work was posted on Internet website "The Juche Idea" of the Socialist Party of Romania, Internet website "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea" in Poland and those of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the MS Travel Agency of Germany between August 6 and 10.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Renamed Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Renamed Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea was renamed the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					 A ceremony of renaming the group took place in Sofia on August 13.
					
					 Chief of the group Lyudmil Kostadinov praised President Kim Il Sung as the great leader who founded the immortal Juche idea, led the Korean revolution to victory and glory and performed undying feats in accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 He praised leader Kim Jong Il as the great leader who steadily developed and enriched the Juche idea with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and worked hard to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He said Kim Jong Il defended the cause of socialism with his Songun politics and wisely led the Korean people's struggle for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The world-startling successes made in the DPRK were associated with the august name of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					 He expressed his conviction that the Korean people would surely build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, single-mindedly rallied behind the dear respected Kim Jong Un, upholding Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars on works and film shows took place in Romania, Bulgaria and Indonesia on Aug. 13 to commemorate the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said in a speech at a meeting that the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as a basic political mode of socialist Korea, recalling that with this Songun revolutionary leadership he frustrated every move of the imperialists against socialism and the DPRK and glorified socialist Korea as an invincible power till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Saying that his Songun revolutionary leadership has been successfully carried forward by the dear respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, he added that the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula will be firmly guaranteed under his steersmanship.
					
					 A seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was held in Bulgaria. The chief of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Bulgaria and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il led the cause of socialism and the cause of independence against imperialism to shining victory by taking the Songun politics as a basic political mode.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il bolstered up the defence capability in every way by providing dynamic leadership, they extended support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of building a rich and powerful nation, closely rallied around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company in a film show said:
					
					 The DPRK turned into an invulnerable stronghold which no force dares provoke thanks to Kim Jong Il's original Songun politics. The Korean people will surely build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the country's reunification as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, successor to the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched such Korean films as "Reply of Korea" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."

articles.title: Songun Leadership Exploits of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Papers of Nepal, Myanmar
articles.content:
Songun Leadership Exploits of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Papers of Nepal, Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Nepal and Myanmar carried special write-ups with portraits of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The Nepali paper Noya Kotparwa on Aug. 10 in an article titled "Songun and Kim Jong Il" said that he developed in depth the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism.
					
					 It noted: Kim Jong Il put forward the Korean People's Army as the main force for accomplishing the socialist cause and put the country's military capacity on the highest level by dint of it. This helped the DPRK steadily hold high the socialist banner despite the worst adversity and bring about a leap forward in building a thriving nation.
					
					 It is thanks to the Songun politics that a foundation for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea has been laid and the country's international position raised remarkably. Not a few politicians are learning from Kim Jong Il's Songun politics.
					
					 The Nepali paper Charcha on Aug. 13 carried an article highly praising the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in his Songun leadership under the title "Kim Jong Il, 52nd anniversary of his start of Songun leadership".
					
					 A paper of Myanmar on Aug. 11 in an article titled "The road being taken by the DPRK" said that the Korean people would never step back from the road of independence.
					
					 The paper cited facts to prove that the DPRK is an independent state.
					
					 It is quite natural for the Korean people to keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism to the last under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in ideology, leadership and personality.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion conjunta de condena a "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion conjunta de condena a "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- A partir de hoy, se desarrollan en toda la extension del Sur de Corea los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" de caracter provocativo con la participacion de mas de 30 mil efectivos norteamericanos, un gran numero de uniformados del ejercito titere surcoreano, el personal militar de Australia, Gran Bretana, Canada, Nueva Zelanda, Dinamarca, Noruega, Francia y otros paises.
					Dada en la Peninsula Coreana la grave situacion a punto de estallido de la guerra, el Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, el Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) y el Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hicieron publica el dia 19 una declaracion conjunta que sigue:
					
					"Ulji Freedom Guardian" es un desafio brutal a la opinion publica interna y externa que desea la paz y el alivio de tension de la Peninsula Coreana, una imperdonable provocacion militar y declaracion general de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Puesto que resultaron fracasadas todas sus acciones hostiles a la RPDC como la sancion, el bloqueo y el intento de aplastarla, EE.UU. y sus satelites surcoreanos tratan ahora de alcanzar a toda costa su objetivo agresivo mediante el uso directo de las fuerzas armadas y la provocacion de guerra.
					
					La severa situacion de hoy demuestra claramente quien es el verdadero perturbador de la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y quien es el provocador de la guerra.
					
					La RPDC cuenta con el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y la unidad monolitica, mas poderosos que cualquier arma nuclear.
					
					Ya dio la orden el Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, General Insigne del monte Paektu.
					
					Si los enemigos se atreven a hacer disparos torpes, no nos limitaremos a la guerra local sino ampliarla a la sagrada guerra total para la reunificacion de la patria sin perder esa oportunidad de oro.
					
					Si el imperialismo estadounidense y la banda titere surcoreana envian una sola bala o bomba en el sagrado territorio y mar de la RPDC en el curso de su imprudente maniobra de guerra contra esta, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias asestaran  en el acto el contragolpe demoledor  a ellos.
					
					Y para descargar el rencor y la indignacion de todos los compatriotas del Norte y el Sur que vinieron sufriendo las desgracias de toda indole debido a la division del pais, eliminaran del territorio patrio a los agresores mediante la sagrada guerra pannacional y lograran sin falta la victoria historica en esta guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Vocero de MINREX exige cancelar la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Vocero de MINREX exige cancelar la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- El vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 20 la siguiente declaracion:
					Se cierne el nubarron de guerra sobre la Peninsula Coreana en el estado de enfrentamiento militar mas agudo del mundo.
					
					A pesar de la unanime aspiracion y demanda de los nacionales y extranjeros sobre la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. inicio por fin los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran dimension con caracter sumamente provocativo y agresivo.
					
					"Ulji Freedom Guardian", expresion militar de la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC, es de punta a cabo una maniobra para la guerra de agresion contra la segunda. En este entrenamiento que se desarrolla en toda la extension del Sur de Corea con denso olor a la polvora, se movilizan enormes fuerzas agresoras, capaces de cumplir una guerra entera, segun el plan de guerra trazado para tomar la RPDC mediante la invasion sorpresiva.
					
					Rechazamos categoricamente esa abierta provocacion militar cometida por EE.UU. poco despues de que defendiera y promoviera un tremendo acto hostil a nuestra maxima dignidad, ideado por la camarilla titere surcoreana.
					
					En estos dias, EE.UU. realiza en la Peninsula Coreana con mas frecuencia y de modo mas intenso los ejercicios militares de gran dimension con el objetivo de controlar con las fuerzas a la RPDC y otros paises vecinos segun su nueva estrategia de defensa nacional. Trasladar su enfoque estrategico a la region de Asia-Pacifico y dominar a Asia a traves del aumento de fuerzas armadas y chantaje militar, he aqui la esencia de la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional de EE.UU.
					
					La primera meta de EE.UU. es aplastar con la fuerza a la RPDC y tomar toda la Peninsula Coreana como trampolin para el cumplimiento de su estrategia de dominar a Asia.
					
					La realidad de hoy nos demanda fortalecer fisicamente el disuasivo de guerra y demuestra que fue mil veces justa nuestra decision de revisar generalmente el problema nuclear.
					
					Nuestro disuasivo de guerra es un justo medio de venganza capaz de castigar implacablemente a los agresores persiguiendolos a cualquier rincon del planeta.
					
					Ademas, es el medio omnipotente para defender la soberania del pais y frenar la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y la garantia que nos permite concentrar en la construccion economica y el mejoramiento de los niveles de la vida del pueblo.
					
					No se puede impedir la guerra con palabras, esto es la realidad irrefutable de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Nuestro fusil garantiza la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					EE.UU. debe ver correctamente la realidad y cancelar inmediatamente su anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue recurriendo a su caduca politica hostil, sufrira un fin tragico.
					
					Responder al primer fuego de los agresores con el contraataque demoledor y extenderlo a la sagrada guerra para la reunificacion de la patria, esto es la inconmovible voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.

articles.title: Inaugurada II Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
Inaugurada II Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 20 en Rason la II Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason.
					Los participantes en la ceremonia de inauguracion rindieron el homenaje postumo al Presidente        Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar un cesto de flores al pie de sus retratos con amplia sonrisa instalados en el pabellon.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en el acto de apertura Jo Jong Ho, presidente del comite organizador del evento y del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Rason, los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de las ramas interesadas y de la ciudad de Rason, los representantes de varios paises y regiones, los extranjeros que tienen negocios en la zona economica y comercial de Rason y los consules generales de China y Rusia en Chongjin.
					
					En la ocasion hubo el discurso de apertura y las palabras de felicitacion.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la presente feria de Rason contribuira a lograr el desarrollo economico y la prosperidad comun de varios paises del mundo.
					
					Expusieron sus convicciones de que los participantes realizaran en la ocasion activos y amplios dialogos y multilaterales negocios.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes pasaron revista a los productos electricos y electronicos, los medios de transporte, las mercancias de industria ligera y medicamentos expuestos por mas de 110 unidades de varios paises y regiones como la RPDC, China, Rusia, Suecia, la Republica Checa y Taipei China.
					
					El mismo dia, se ofrecio una recepcion dedicada a la inauguracion.

articles.title: Caravana de antorcha pasa la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Caravana de antorcha pasa la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
						
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- La caravana de carrera de relevos con antorcha de los jovenes (columna para la zona costera occidental), que habia partido del monte Paektu con motivo del Dia de la Juventud (28 de agosto), paso hoy la ciudad de Sinuiju.
					La antorcha, que atraveso la provincia de Ryanggang y la de Jagang, fue entregada el dia 17 en el distrito de Hyangsan a la caravana de relevos de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					
					Los nuevos relevos rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar cesto y ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erigida en el distrito de Hyangsan.
					
					La caravana, que salio de ese distrito en medio de calurosa despedida, llego al distrito de Changsong luego de pasar por el de Tongchang.
					
					Los corredores asistieron a la reunion al lado de fogata organizada por los jovenes y estudiantes del distrito de Changsong.
					
					Los participantes juraron apoyar con mas fidelidad la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un con la antorcha que les trasladaron las generaciones antecedentes de la revolucion.
					
					Por via del distrito de Uiju, la caravana llego a la ciudad de Sinuiju donde sostuvo el encuentro con los hombres ameritados de la generacion antecesora junto con los jovenes y estudiantes de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
						En la Granja Cooperativa de Sinam del distrito de Ryongchon tomo parte en la presentacion de experiencias de un jefe del subequipo juvenil de trabajo.
					
					El orador subrayo que acondicionar bien el poblado y el centro de trabajo como paraiso de la era de Songun deviene la noble obligacion de los jovenes, soldados y discipulos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Luego, los relevos pasaron por los distritos de Tongrim, Kwaksan y Pakchon y la ciudad de Jongju, donde recibieron hospitalarios saludos de despedida de parte de los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y escolares locales.
					
					La caravana avanza a pasos firmes hacia Pyongyang.
